scripts.wasm:watch: cargo watch --watch src --watch Cargo.toml -s "pnpm run wasm:build"
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run wasm:build --release && tsc && vite build
scripts.lint: prettier --plugin-search-dir . --check "**/*" -u && eslint . --ext .js,.ts && cargo fmt --check && cargo clippy -- -D warnings
scripts.demo:dev: pnpm run clean && pnpm run wasm:build --debug && vite
scripts.demo:build: pnpm run wasm:build --release && tsc && vite build -c vite.demo.config.ts
